title: Enhancement of weak signals by applying a suppression method to high-intense methyl and methylene signals of lipids in NMR spectroscopy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26873-26883
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03019B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Upendra Singh, Abdul-Hamid Emwas, Mariusz Jaremko
In this study, we applied a method of suppression to suppress the intense peaks of methyl and methylene groups to allow detection of weaker peaks in NMR spectroscopy of lipids.
